name: Zedna pending post indicator and notifier
author: Radek Mezulanik

sections.description: Show the number of pending posts waiting for approval in the admin menu, if any. Also automatically supports custom post types. Sends email notification of posts pending review.
sections.installation:
1. Upload zedna-pending-post-inidicator-and-notifier folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings->Pending post indicator and notifier
  4. Add your e-mail
sections.faq:
Where can i see post status?
You can see small number in Posts item(or any other post type) in admin menu.

short_description: Display number of posts waiting for approval in administration. Send an email about waiting approval, approved/rejected post.
